PA0.label: mentions
PA0.title: Software-mentions text mining origin ID
PA0.description: to be used to relate a software citation in a document to its extracted description by the software-mentions service

PA1.label: rOpenSci
PA1.title: rOpenSci origin ID
PA1.description: to be used to relate a software to its rOpenSci package

PA2.label: refkey
PA2.title: associated key/rank in a reference list

PA3.label: callout
PA3.title: callout used in text to reference a bibliographical entry
